name: Pet Companion Bot
description: Interactive robot that plays with cats and dogs using camera-based pet detection, random movement, and a treat dispenser
author: catdad_marco
hardware: Small treat hopper (3D printed or cardboard)
use_case: Keeps my two cats entertained while I'm at work. Drives around randomly, detects when a cat is nearby via camera, and dispenses treats from a small hopper mounted on top. Claude Sonnet decides when to move, when to pause, and when to dispense based on what it sees.
